title: The Beauty of Ashes
description: Things are about to heat up.Alana is back on Earth in the custody of the War Lord. She isn't happy about it.Glenn is still in the Elemental World, coping as best he can. If he can crawl out of the bottle long enough, he just might be able to bring her back. Oh, and their world is on fire.Open up this final installment of The Legends of Rune and prepare to be entertained. You've waited long enough.
author: April  Adams Ames
